channel.title: "bank of Hybrid pvp" need to be changed! SOLVED!
channel.description: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/fjf8m9.png[/img] i want to change to my own server, but i have no idea how, can someone please help me?

item.title: "bank of Hybrid pvp" need to be changed! SOLVED!
item.dc:creator: @black_guy42 black guy42
item.description:
@black_guy42 wrote:

AliAbid:

Search your whole files (ctrl+f) or the feature added to your mac (I believe). Then change all of hybrid pvp to what you want. You will eventualy find “bank of hybrid pvp”

i already did it on RSinterface.java
btw its not a mac, its only a program that modifies all ur files to llok like a mac but mines win 7 8gb ram 3tb hdd and 500 gb ssd all watercooling with 2gb video lol

item.dc:creator: @black_guy42 black guy42
item.description:
@black_guy42 wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:7, topic:443315”]Lol, I can do it if I download a source i’d like to use…
(More motivation).

BELIEVE it’s client sided, in the file ‘client.java’?
If not it’s for sure client sided…
Client sided = the Interfaces & Line ID’s where the actual ‘text’ is being sent to, so think it’ll be checked there first.[/quote]
lol nope, im gonna keep trying, but im about to quit this thing

item.title: "bank of Hybrid pvp" need to be changed! SOLVED!
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Lol, I can do it if I download a source i’d like to use…
(More motivation).

BELIEVE it’s client sided, in the file ‘client.java’?
If not it’s for sure client sided…
Client sided = the Interfaces & Line ID’s where the actual ‘text’ is being sent to, so think it’ll be checked there first.

EDIT: FOUND IT:

Client sided: RSInterface.java

            if(rsinterface.type == 4)
            {
                rsinterface.message = stream.readString().replaceAll("RuneScape", "Elite Demons");
                rsinterface.aString228 = stream.readString();
            }

Read full topic

item.description:
@black_guy42 wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:5, topic:443315”]Don’t search ‘bank of’.
It’s a common thing with [PI], what you’ll have to do is search for a method.

The method is most likely client sided, (I can’t remember…).

Example of the method:

replaces ALLLL words of 'RUNESCAPE' with 'your server name'.

Gl searchin.[/quote]

yupp, being a newbie at this thing, i have no idea what your saying, but if im trying to find the ‘method’ is there anyone out there who can give me the whole method line?

item.title: "bank of Hybrid pvp" need to be changed! SOLVED!
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“nickog15, post:2, topic:443315”]I just came back to rsps, so i will give you the awnser that i believe is correct.

Go to your source, search for “Hybrid” or “hyrbird pvp” and everything that pops up, open it, search for “hybrid pvp” or “hybrid” and then change with the name to your server and complie.

I’m not sure if you need to do this with your client but you could try.

Best of luck.;D[/quote]
No , The search engine cant find that.
Almost tryed it…

[quote=“black guy42, post:1, topic:443315”]
i want to change to my own server, but i have no idea how, can someone please help me?[/quote]
Check if you got in Your Client a “filesearcher.java”

item.title: "bank of Hybrid pvp" need to be changed! SOLVED!
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

I just came back to rsps, so i will give you the awnser that i believe is correct.

Go to your source, search for “Hybrid” or “hyrbird pvp” and everything that pops up, open it, search for “hybrid pvp” or “hybrid” and then change with the name to your server and complie.

I’m not sure if you need to do this with your client but you could try.

Best of luck.;D

Read full topic
